title: **BRAND NEW RENOVATION - BU/BC - Outdoor Patio - HALF BROKER FEE**
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41031404', 'Rent: $3,295 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'WOW!!', ' Newly renovated 2 Bed 1 Bath in Brighton/Brookline professionally managed building minutes from Commonwealth Ave.', 'Conveniently located between BC and BU - easy access to downtown Boston and Cambridge.', 'MBTA Green Line Sutherland Road.', 'New appliances, stainless steel, hardwood floors - Laundry in Building - Heat and Hot Water INCLUDED -  50% Broker Fee PAID BY OWNER.', 'APPLY NOW!!', '   Schedule your showing with Chris this week!', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @ <URL>          860 - 309 - 8511', 'Tram: B Sutherland Road (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Englewood Ave (0.30 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.36 mi)', 'Tram: C Englewood Avenue (0.25 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.37 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.35 mi)', '41031404', 'FEATURES', 'Shopping Accessible', 'T Accessible', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
